titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7662

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Frankfort, August 20. 1862.
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: of State
Sir

I have this day issued & delivered the following Commissions viz:
John M. Moore Q. Mas. date June 17. 1862
Tho. Forman 1 Lieut: " July 1. 1862
Henry Cassen 2 " " " " "
Horatio B. McCorkhill 1 Lieut " May 24. "
David Jones 2 " " June 17. "
Christopher Leonard 1 " " " 10. "
John Leaf 2 " " " " "
Joseph E. Miller 1 " " May 25. "
James H. Baly 2 " " " " "
Wm H. Powell Capt " July 6. "
Terrance F. Burns 2 " " " " "
John W. Huston " " " May 17. "
John P. Hurley 1 " " " 24. "
John D. Sheppard 2 Lieut: May 9. 1862.
Jackson H. Jacobs " -- Aug 21. 1862.

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adj. Gen: Ky: Vols:
